trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Elmer

divs: Sighting Detailslooked as a star thought it was an air plane but very high in the sky. i had watched it for a little bit because it seemed to be moving faster then a plane would for that altitude, but it then suddenly made a quick and sharp U turn and went for a while then made another sharp turn about 100 to 110 degree turn and sped up very fast then i lost it in some clouds and it was gone . this wasnt my first time seeing this this is my 4th in 2 years watching and paying attention to the skys and it is always a bright dot in the sky with the ability to make its self brighter noticeably at will and make sharpfast turns and fly faster then any airplane i have seen i am just so curiouse to what this is flying that high and fast
